name: Zingerman's Cornman Farms
description: A picturesque estate and culinary destination offering packages for micro weddings and elopements, with a focus on farm-to-table feasts. They also offer a "Tiny Wedding" option for very small parties

name: Stone Chalet
description: Offers decision-free, all-inclusive micro wedding, minimony, and elopement packages for up to 26 people, with options for indoor or outdoor ceremonies

name: Castle Farms
description: A historic venue offering a dedicated space for microweddings in the Queen's Courtyard, with a reception space in The Castle Pub. Packages include ceremony and reception space, a venue coordinator, and furniture/décor

name: Lake Bluff Preserve
description: A private preserve on Lake Michigan offering stunning lake views and packages for small weddings (30 guests or less), including lodging

name: The Glass House Community
description: A greenhouse gathering space on a historic farm, ideal for micro weddings of up to 50 guests (best suited for 30-40). Offers a serene environment with vintage charm

name: Victoria Chapel
description: A tranquil lakeside venue offering indoor and outdoor ceremony and reception settings, with packages for small weddings and elopements

name: Cafe Cortina
description: An Italian restaurant that accommodates micro weddings for up to 30 guests, featuring a gorgeous covered courtyard and a garden-like atmosphere

name: Futtitinni Events
description: An event planning company specializing in weddings and celebrations, offering strategy, warmth, and artistry with a focus on alleviating stress for couples

name: Simply Brilliant Events
description: A full-service wedding planning boutique based in Detroit, specializing in custom event design and meticulous details for seamless and stunning weddings

name: Fox & Fern Events
description: A destination wedding planning company focused on creating custom experiences in Northern Michigan, specializing in full-service planning and design
